text: Lisa Vanderpump may have been born in London, England, but the British television personality became a hit with American audiences when she starred in the reality series The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. But fans and the network obviously loved Lisa Vanderpump so much that they gave her a spin - off called Vanderpump Rules. So, what do fans find so enticing about the series? The juicy drama, for starters. There are romances, scandals, and rumors always making each episode of the show more and more enticing to watch. The series itself highlights what current culture is like among the rich and famous, but viewers find Lisa to be an empowering individual who happens to love the glitz and glam.
